title: Nations and Armies as Tools in God’s Hand
html: In this chapter, Isaiah warns the Israelites of dire consequences for their neglect of the poor and needy. As a result of their wickedness, the Lord will use the Assyrian army as a tool to remind Israel of her broken covenants with God. Isaiah also describes the pride of the Assyrian king, which will be the cause of his empire’s eventual downfall. In the midst of prophesying judgment and destruction, Isaiah reveals that a remnant of the house of Israel will return. As is typical of Isaiah’s writings, the events described in this chapter have both ancient historical and future prophetic fulfillment.
